meaningMnemonic: The <radical>roof</radical> (hive) on a <radical>certain</radical> <radical>insect</radical> (a bee) is what protects all of the <kanji>honey</kanji> or <kanji>nectar</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: To get the <kanji>honey</kanji> out, you need to put on special <reading>mitts</reading> (みつ) so your hands don't get stung.
